english: Who are you? (Sound of swords being drawn)
(Sound of swords being drawn) (All together) Allah!

text: Ben peşinden gideceğim. Siz de ardımdan gelin.
english: I will follow him. Follow me .
Some of you can stay here. Come join us
I stabbed my brother in the back.
What does it matter if I die?
're going to the drain. Come on

text: Bre densizler, niye rahat bırakmazsınız kızı?
english: people, why won't you leave the girl alone?

text: Türkler efendim, Helena'yla beklediğimiz yere baskın yaptılar.
english: The Turks, sir, raided the place where Helena and I were waiting.
(The soldier) voluntarily sought refuge with the Turks.

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Ertuğrul Bey çok yaşa! (Dündar) Ana.
english: (All together) Long live Ertuğrul Bey! (Dündar) Mother.

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Ertuğrul Bey çok yaşa!
(Hep bir ağızdan) Ertuğrul Bey çok yaşa! (Hayme) Oğlum.
english: (All together) Long live Ertuğrul Bey! (Hayme) My son.

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Ertuğrul Bey çok yaşa!
(Hep bir ağızdan) Ertuğrul Bey çok yaşa! (Hayme) Oğlum.
english: (All together) Long live Ertuğrul Bey! (Hayme) My son.

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Ertuğrul Bey çok yaşa!
(Hep bir ağızdan) Ertuğrul Bey çok yaşa!
english: (All together) Long live Ertuğrul Bey! Thank you,

text: Bana kardeşini sağ salim getirdin ya...
english: Bringing your brother back to me safe and sound...
...you've added years to my life, son.
You brought hope to your father's tent.

text: ...senin gibi bir evlat verdiği için bana Ertuğrul Bey'im.
english: giving me a son like you, Ertuğrul Bey.

text: Doğan'ımın eti dağların doruğu gibi buz kesmiş...
english: My Doğan's flesh is as frozen as the mountain peaks...
...while he lies beneath the dark earth...
...will God reunite my Doğan with his child? Will

text: Yiğidim döner gelir de çadırında erliğini eder mi?
english: my brave man return and prove his manhood in his tent?

text: Sen sana sırtını yaslamış kardeşine diz çöktürdün Dündar.
english: You made your brother, who relied on you, kneel before you, Dündar. You sacrificed Doğan, who had survived so many
to the fantasy of a woman.
... whatever you tell me, you're right.
Our path is not for the weak, but for the brave.
...you are neither the chieftain of this tribe...
I believed my father's words. Please.
(Bani Cicek) May your torment be abundant.

text: Ertuğrul ile Aliyar'a bir mektup yollayacaksınız.
english: a letter to Ertuğrul and Aliyar .

text: ...bizi kendi safına çekmek için hile peşindedir.
english: ... is trying to trick us into joining his side. You will say it's
time for unity in taking precautions .

text: Ertuğrul Bey'le Aliyar Bey, seninle gizli gizli görüştüğümüzden şüphe etmekte.
english: Ertuğrul Bey and Aliyar Bey suspect that we have been meeting secretly. What if they
don't believe our word? Then you will say
Vasilius, along with his soldiers, threatens to

text: ...obalarımıza baskın yapmakla bizi tehdit eder diyeceksiniz.

english: is springtime (in the Urals). You will say that we will have to
take our villages and leave these cursed lands...

text: Bu üç obanın da bu topraklardan gitmesini göze alamazlar.
english: They cannot afford to let these three tribes leave these lands. And

text: Sonra siz onları Hanlı Pazar'da oyalarken...
english: Then, while you keep them occupied in Hanlı Bazaar ...

text: Şahitler, siz de şahitlik ettiniz mi?
english: Witnesses, did you also testify? -We did

text: Ben de şahitlerin ve burada bulunan ahalinin huzurunda nikâhınızı kıydım.
english: I have solemnly performed your marriage ceremony in the presence of the witnesses and the people who are here. May
Dündar did not attend Bamsı's wedding.
What more can I say, my dear?
Forgive me for what I have done.

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Gök ova, kıraç tepede çadır dikti.
english: (All together) The sky pitched its tent on the barren hill. What did he do

text: Gönül verip sevdiği hatun için neler etti?
english: for the woman he loved so much ?

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Attan aygır, deveden buğra, koyundan koç kırdılar.
english: (All at once) They killed stallions from horses, bulls from camels, and rams from sheep. Did they

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Ne gönül kırdılar ne kem söz ettiler.
english: (All speaking in unison) They neither broke hearts nor spoke ill words.
(All at once) They performed the marriage ceremony.

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Sevdikleriyle gerdeğe girip muradına erdiler.
english: (All at once) They entered the bridal chamber with their loved ones and achieved their desires . May

text: O vakit Allah onları mutlu mesut etsin.
english: God grant them happiness and joy.
God bless you with happiness, brother.
Come on, come on, come on!

text: Şunlara bak Bamsı. Sanki rüyada gibiyim.
english: Look at these, Bamsi. I feel like I'm in a dream .

text: (Hafsa) Ahali ne çok hediye getirmiş. Her şey var.
english: (Hafsa) The people have brought so many gifts! We have everything.
That's right. That's how our village is. On

text: Bir yandan beyimiz, ahali bir yandan.
english: one side, our lord, on the other, the people.

text: Artık kimin gücü neye yeterse getirirler. Töremiz böyledir.
english: Now they'll bring whatever they can get their hands on. That is our tradition.

text: Hem Hafsa Hatun, yuva kurmakta bereket vardır.
english: Hafsa Hatun said that establishing a home brings blessings.

text: İmdi, imdi diyesin sen, başkaca ihtiyacın var mıdır?
english: Now, now, you might ask, do you have any other needs? Don't

text: Bir şeye ihtiyacım var mı diye sorma bana Bamsı.
english: ask me if I need anything, Bamsi.

text: Bil ki sen neye gülersen ben de ona gülerim…
english: Know that whatever you laugh at, I laugh at too…

text: …sen neye ağlarsan ben de ona ağlarım.
english: …whatever you cry about, I cry about too. You

text: Hay ne güzel konuşursun sen. Hay maşallah sana. Yaşayasın.
english: speak so beautifully. May God bless you! Long live! Isn't that what

text: İkiyken bir olmak, anı yükü sırtlanıp aynı keyfi yaşamak.
english: be one when you are two, to share the burden of memories and experience the same joy.
Our wedding ceremony has been a balm to

text: …senin de, sevdiklerinin de acısına merhem oldu.
english: your pain, and the pain of your loved ones, during these difficult times .
marriage has given hope to the people. And
I too have been reunited with my beloved.
What more could I ask from God?
Perhaps you want a child, Bamsi. Haha
from now on this tent is our home
… let our bed be our paradise.

text: Ee, Hafsa Hatun, benim namaz kılmam gerekiyor.
english: Well, Hafsa Hatun, I need to pray. Don't
Wait here. I'm going to pray.

text: Ertuğrul da, Aliyar da birliği sağlamak maksadıyla…

english: will be at the inn until evening, with the aim of securing unity… ….

text: Onların bu yokluğu obanın bütün kapılarını açacak bana.
english: Their absence will open all the doors of the tribe to me.

text: Aliyar’ı baş edinen onca Alp ne olacak?
english: What will become of all those Alps who took Aliyar as their leader?
They'll be hunted while they're out hunting, Vasilius. I will send
all of Aliyar's Alps hunting. There will be no one left

text: Obada bana karşı direnen kimse kalmayacak.
english: in Obada who can resist me . Don't underestimate
the power of the people, Ural. Could they possibly accept

text: Hain olarak gördükleri birini baş kabul edebilecekler mi?
english: someone they consider a traitor as their leader?
People are sensitive to life, Vasilius. When I slaughter the few who

text: Bana karşı duran üç beş kişiyi kılıçtan geçirdiğim vakit…

english: even be able to stick their noses out of their tents .
They will have to pledge allegiance to me.

text: Umarım hesapların tutar Ural. Çünkü bu son hamlen olacak.
english: I hope your calculations add up, Ural. Because this will be your last move.
You'll either have to take a deep breath
... or you'll suffocate. (Breathing sound) If I lose my

text: Benim nefesim kesilirse senin de nefesin kesilir.
english: breath, you'll lose yours too. If

text: Ertuğrul’u bana destek veren onca Türk beyiyle durduramazsam…
english: I cannot stop Ertuğrul with all the Turkish beys who support me…
…it will be a bad end for both of us.
I doubt the loyalty of the Turkish lords.
They are loyal to me. They are honored to

text: Ural Bey, bir menfaati olmayan hangi insan senin ardın sıra gider?
english: Mr. Ural, what kind of person would follow you without a vested interest?

text: Söyle, söyle. Onlara ne vaat ettin?
english: Tell me, tell me. What did you promise them? Thank goodness we got

text: Çok şükür Bamsı’yı da baş göz ettik beyim.

english: God be pleased with you, sir.

text: Böyle meclisler, böyle şenlikler dostlarla güzel.
english: Such gatherings and celebrations are best enjoyed with friends. May
God be pleased with you too.
messenger has arrived from the Turkmen chieftains, my lord.
-And peace be upon you. -Wa alaikum assalam.

text: Türk beylerinden haber getirdim, Ertuğrul Bey.
english: I have brought news from the Turkish lords, Ertuğrul Bey.

text: Beylerimiz yarım kalan birlik toyumuzun tamam olmasını diler.
english: Our gentlemen wish for the completion of our unfinished union celebration.

text: Bundan sebep, yarın Hanlı Pazar’da toy isterler.
english: Therefore, they want a wedding at Hanlı Bazaar tomorrow.

text: Aliyar Bey’e de haber ulaştı. O da iştirak edecektir beyim.
english: Aliyar Bey also received the news. He will also participate, sir.

text: Türkmen beylerini misafir etmekten şeref duyacağımı iletesin onlara.
english: Tell them that I would be honored to host the Turkmen chieftains.

text: E böylesi iyi oldu beyim. Yarım kalan işimiz de tamam olur.
english: Well, that's a good thing, sir. Our unfinished business will also be completed.

text: Sen yine de gerekli tedbirleri alasın Turgut.
english: You should still take the necessary precautions, Turgut. Place the Alps in
the path of the gentlemen's future .

text: Vasilius’un gücü kalmamıştır. Lakin yine de biz tedbirimizi alalım.
english: Vasilius has no power left. However, let's still take precautions. Yes sir, your wish is my command

text: Ural Bey söyle, ne vaat ettin onlara?
english: Ural Bey, tell me, what did you promise them?
I promised them their freedom. They will have to choose between following in

text: …kendi ayaklarının üstünde yücelmek arasında bir tercih yapacaklar.
english: prominence on their own two feet .

text: Peki, obanı geri aldıktan sonra topraklarımı terk etmezseniz…
english: So, if you don't leave my lands after I take back your tribe
… do they know they will die?
I spoke to them. We will

text: Obalarımızı alıp bu toprakları terki diyar edeceğiz.
english: take our villages and leave these lands . We will go to

text: Daha ganimetli, daha bereketli topraklara gideceğiz.

english: These gentlemen are more foolish than I thought.

text: Ben olsam Hanlı Pazar’ı, altın madenini…
english: I were them, I wouldn't leave Hanlı Bazaar, the gold mine...

text: …hatta Karacahisar Kalesi’ni bırakıp hiçbir yere gitmem.
english: ...or even Karacahisar Castle and go anywhere.

text: Siz Türklerin güzel bir lafı var. Sadeddin’den öğrenmiştim.
english: You Turks have a nice saying. I learned it from Sadeddin. At
this rate, I'll master Turkish. Well done

text: Onları eli boş çekip gitmeye ikna etmek büyük iş doğrusu.
Benim için önemli olan, Ertuğrul’un soyunu kurutup…
english: important to me is to wipe out Ertuğrul's lineage...

text: …Kayıları kendime bağlamaktır, sonra da huzur içinde yaşamak.
english: ...and bring the Kayı tribe under my control, and then live in peace. There is no greater booty

text: …Türkmen beyleri için de bundan daha değerli ganimet yoktur.
english: for the Turkmen chieftains… than this . My

text: Ben ve adamlarım obanın yakınlarında seni bekliyor olacağız.
english: men and I will be waiting for you near the camp. I'll be the

text: Zaferini kutlayan ilk kişi ben olacağım Ural Bey.
english: first to congratulate you on your victory, Mr. Ural.

text: …bu işi beceremezsen, canın tehlikeye girerse imdadına yetişeceğim.
english: you can't manage this, and your life is in danger, I'll come to your rescue . Don't
victory be with us then. That
's alright, Mr. Ural. Let it be.
Until we return with Ural Bey...
...please give Çolpan Hatun a proper welcome at the castle .
My wife will come with me!

text: O kadar kan dökülecek. Çolpan Hatun zarar görür.
english: So much blood will be shed. Çolpan Hatun gets hurt.
Staying in the castle is the safest option. If

text: Öleceksek birlikte öleceğiz. Onu burada rehin bırakamam.
english: we're going to die, we'll die together. I can't leave him here as a hostage.
Ural is a guest, not a hostage.
You will be reunited with your Cholpan when we return victorious. It's

text: Böyle olması ikimiz için de daha iyi.
english: better this way for both of us.

text: Eğer bir hata ederse Çolpan’ı öldürün.
english: Kill Cholpan if she makes a mistake. Yes sir, please
've wasted yourself. My heart sinks whenever

text: Evlatlarım ne vakit birbirine kırılsa yüreğim ağzıma gelir.
english: my children fall out with each other . May
God not sow discord among them.
Mother, Mr. Dündar is understanding. Would

text: Hem Ertuğrul Bey kardeşinin zararına bir karar alır mı?
english: Ertuğrul Bey make a decision that would harm his brother? He did this so that

text: Dündar Bey’im ders alsın diye böyle etmiştir.
english: Mr. Dündar would learn a lesson . He

text: Ne nikâha geldi ne ortalıkta gözüktü.
english: neither came to the wedding nor was he seen anywhere. I

text: Haber ettim çadırına baksınlar diye. Hâlâ haber gelmedi.
english: informed them to check his tent. Still no news.
I hope my worst fears don't come true.
(Kutluca) May I have some free time, sir?
Mr. Aliyar, I have something to say. Come on then

text: Beyim, nicedir kara bulutlara gark olduk.
english: My lord, we have been shrouded in dark clouds for quite some time .
Our Alps are sad, their faces are downcast.

text: Ben derim ki müsaade edersen yarın Alpleri ava çıkaralım.
english: I suggest we go hunting in the Alps tomorrow, if you'll allow me. Let them
shoot arrows and polish their weapons.

text: Alplerin vaziyetini ben de düşünürüm, beyim.
english: I also consider the situation in the Alps, sir.

text: Lakin malum tedbirlerden dolayı bir yere salamadım.
english: However, due to the well-known restrictions, I couldn't send it anywhere. Let

text: Bir kısım Alp obada nöbetçi kalsın. Diğerleri gitsinler beyim.
english: some of the Alps remain on guard in the camp. Let the others go, sir.
We'll release the others when they return.

text: Eyvallah. Kutluca sana kararımı haber edecek.
english: Thanks. Kutluca will let you know my decision . Yes sir, your wish is my command

text: Emrin olur beyim. Sen nasıl münasip görürsen.
Beyim, Tayı beyi de bizim safımıza yanaşır gibi.
english: Sir, it seems Mr. Tay is also approaching our side.
We'll wait and see, Kutluca. Even

text: Her ne kadar sadakati şüpheli de olsa…
english: though his loyalty is questionable… what
they say about the Alps is true.

text: Küffarla cenkte, Alplerin haletiruhiyesi önemlidir Kutluca.
english: In battles against infidels, the morale of the Alps is important, Kutluca. The

text: Var git söyle, sabah tez gitsinler, tez dönsünler.
english: Go tell them to leave early in the morning and return quickly.
Keep your eyes on them. Yes sir, your wish is my command
(Sound of door opening) (Sound of door creaking)
the mountains have collapsed on your chest.

text: Kestiğin ceza kardeşine ağır oldu oğul.
english: The punishment you gave your brother was too harsh, son.
broken, it can never be straightened again.

text: Kardeşim, Süleyman Şah'la senin gibi görklü bir ananın evladıdır.
english: My brother, Suleyman Shah, is the son of a glorious mother like you.

text: ...kaderin ona verdiği utançtan ders çıkarmayı bilecektir.
english: ...will learn a lesson from the shame that fate has inflicted upon him .

text: Bütün saflığıyla sana inandı, ardından geldi.
english: She believed in you with all her sincerity, and then she followed you.
He grew up in your hands, son.
...I try to be both a brother and a husband to Dündar
...I will treat Dündar the same way I would treat one of my Alps (warriors)
, I can't distinguish between them. I will do
what I learned from my father, Suleyman Shah.

text: Ertuğrul, ben sana her daim itimat ettim oğul.
english: Ertuğrul, I have always trusted you, my son. Don't let your relationship with

text: Benim ana olarak sizi kol kola görmekten başka gayem yoktur evlat.
english: As a mother, my only wish is to see you two arm in arm, my child.

text: ...Dündar Bey'in obadan atıyla ayrıldığını görenler olmuş.
english: ...there were people who saw Dündar Bey leaving the camp on his horse.

text: Gecenin bu vakti nereye gider Abdurrahman?
english: Where would Abdurrahman go at this time of night ?
I've arrived at your tent, sir.
Your tears have ended, Çolpan. It's

text: Gayri saadet bize, keder onlara layıktır.
english: Unhappiness is for us, sorrow is for them.
I always believed you, sir. I said that

text: Ural'ım er geç bize yapılan zulmün karşılığını verir dedim.
english: Ural will eventually exact revenge for the injustice done to us .

text: İnanıyorum ki yarın obamıza vardığımızda layık olduğumuz biçimde karşılanacağız.
english: I believe that when we arrive at our camp tomorrow, we will be welcomed in a manner befitting us. Those who

text: Bizi obamızdan, otağımızdan ayıranlar cezasını görecek.
english: separated us from our village and our tent will be punished.

text: Obamı aldığım vakit, buraya seni götürmeye değil...
english: When I take my tribe, I will not come here to take you with me...

text: ...Vasilius'un kellesini alıp, bu kalenin sahibi olmaya geleceğim.
english: ...but to take Vasilius's head and become the owner of this castle. And then, the last remaining scar

text: İşte o vakit, senin kalbindeki kapanmayan son yara izi de...

english: How is this going to happen?
Half of the soldiers were killed.

text: Ee, bu kaleye bir dost gibi girip çıkabilen bir tek ben varım.
english: Well, I'm the only one who can enter and leave this castle like a friend .

text: Türkmen Beylerimin de desteğiyle bu kaleyi...
english: With the support of my Turkmen chieftains, capturing this fortress
will not be difficult for me. Then
...you will be welcomed like a queen.
"Since I set out on the road for your destination...
...you wanted to teach me, brother, that leadership is about intellect, not weapons...

text: ...diri bir imanla olduğunu öğretmek istedin bana abi.
english: ...that heroism is about a living faith, not empty courage.

text: Lakin bunu idrak etmekten ne kadar ırak olduğumu anladım.
english: But I realized how far I was from understanding this.
I have committed an irreparable, unforgivable sin.
(Ertuğrul) I have no face to show to you...
...nor to Banı Çiçek, whom I widowed...

text: ...ne de yetim koyduğum Doğan'ın evladının yüzüne bakacak yüzüm yoktur.
english: ...nor to Doğan, whom I orphaned . Forgive me,

text: Anam da, obamız da sana emanettir."
english: My mother and our tribe are entrusted to you."
Ertuğrul, if Dündar had become a martyr...

text: ...şahadet şerbeti içti diye sevinç gözyaşları dökerdim.
english: ... I would have shed tears of joy, saying he drank the nectar of martyrdom.
But I can't bear to lose him like this.

text: Ne yap et Dündar'ı bana getir.
english: Do whatever it takes to bring Dündar to me. My

text: Gayrı bu canım onun yokluğuna takat getiremez.
english: soul can no longer bear his absence .
Abdurrahman, send the Alps after Dündar. Let them dig through

text: Gerekirse dağı taşı delik deşik etsinler.

english: They shouldn't return to the camp without finding Dündar.
(Sound of a hand clapping) Yes sir
(Ertuğrul) Is there permission? Here you go, son
(Ibn Arabi's laughter) (Sound of clapping) He who

text: Dünyada huzur arayanın huzuru kaçar evlat.
english: seeks peace in this world will find his peace disturbed, my son.

text: Huzur, ancak kardeşçe birbirine sarılanlara verilir.
english: Peace is given only to those who embrace each other in brotherhood . Now tell me
What is it that is making you so uneasy? Before the
grief over Doğan has even subsided...

text: ...imdi de kardeşim Dündar obayı terk etmiştir.
english: ...now my brother Dündar has left the tribe as well.

text: Bu vaziyet anamı ziyadesiyle mahzun etti.
english: This situation made my mother very sad.

text: Mevkisi yüce olanın derdi âli olur evladım.
english: My son, those in high positions have nobler concerns.

text: Zira sen ahaliden biri değil, ahaliden mesul olansın.
english: Because you are not one of the people, but responsible for the people.

text: Sen kardeşine verdiğin cezayı nefsin için değil...
english: You punished your brother not for your own selfish reasons... ...but

text: (İbn-i Arabi) Adaleti tesis etmek için verdin.
english: (Ibn Arabi) You gave it to establish justice.

text: Kardeşinse vicdanının sesiyle obayı terk etti.
english: Your brother, however, followed his conscience and left the camp.

text: Hatasını fark edeni affetmek dinimizce vaciptir.
english: Forgiving someone who realizes their mistake is obligatory in our religion.
Our Prophet, who is a mercy to all creation, declared the
Ansar and the Muhajir to be brothers when he migrated from Mecca to Medina. Among the companions of

text: Efendimizin kardeş kıldığı sahabe-i ikram arasında...
english: the Prophet, whom he considered brothers ...

text: Lakin onlar hemen hatalarından af diler ve telafi etme yoluna giderlerdi.
english: But they would immediately apologize for their mistakes and take steps to make amends.

text: Umulur ki Dündar Bey de hatasını...
english: Hopefully, Mr. Dündar will also make amends for his mistake in the best possible

text: Yüce Rabbimiz Hucurat suresinde buyurur ki...
english: Almighty Lord says in Surah Hujurat: "...
So make peace between your brothers, and

text: Allah'a karşı gelmekten sakının ki size merhamet etsin."
english: fear Allah, that He may have mercy on you."
...brothers are like beads on a rosary.

text: Onların nizamını, safını belli edense beyleridir.
english: Their order and allegiance are determined by their leaders . Just
like the main bead of a rosary.

text: İmdi sana düşen tane ayırt etmeden...

english: to embrace all your brothers and sisters without distinction.
(Ibn Arabi) For humankind is like dough.
If you squeeze it too hard, it will slip through your fingers.

text: İdareci olmak, mesuliyet sahibi olmak zordur.
english: Being a leader, being responsible, is difficult. That is why the

text: Bunun için ki ahrette en büyük mükafatı...
english: greatest reward in the hereafter will
be received by just rulers. May

...I will return victorious. May you live long,

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Ural Bey'im çok yaşa.
(Hep bir ağızdan) Ural Bey'im çok yaşa.
(Hep bir ağızdan) Ural Bey'im çok yaşa.

english: ...the honorable lords of the Çavdar tribe... ...
justice has finally prevailed in our tribe .
(Ural) We took back my father's tent and
our encampment from the hands of the traitors.
Now is the time for revenge. Both

text: Ertuğrul da, Aliyar da belalarını bulacaklar.
english: Ertuğrul and Aliyar will get what they deserve.
(Ural) The sole rulers of these lands...
will be the valiant warriors of this glorious victory.

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Çok yaşa Ural Bey'im.
(Hep bir ağızdan) Çok yaşa Ural Bey'im.
(Hep bir ağızdan) Çok yaşa Ural Bey'im.
Anlaşılan o ki Ural Bey obayı ele geçirmiş.
english: seems Ural Bey has captured the village .
I hope you don't mess it up.

text: Aliyar obaya geldiğinde güzel bir manzarayla karşılaşacak.
english: Aliyar will be greeted with a beautiful view when he arrives at the camp.

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Çok yaşa Ural Bey'im.
(Hep bir ağızdan) Çok yaşa Ural Bey'im.
(Hep bir ağızdan) Çok yaşa Ural Bey'im.
(Hep bir ağızdan) Çok yaşa Ural Bey'im.
(Hep bir ağızdan) Çok yaşa Ural Bey'im.

english: ...where are you? Where are you, Bamsi?

text: Bu adam hayatta olduğu müddetçe intikam almadan durmaz.
english: This man will never rest until he gets his revenge, as long as he's alive.

text: Ertuğrul'um hayatta olduğu sürece kılımıza dokunamaz.
english: As long as Ertuğrul is alive, no one can touch a hair on our heads .
My son will come to my rescue like Khidr, I swear to God.

text: Nasıl ana? Burada olduğumuzdan haberi dahi yoktur.
english: How are you, Mom? He does n't even know we're here.
We were left with no other option. Do

text: Sakın bu soysuzun önünde korktuğunu gösterme!
english: n't you dare show fear in front of this scoundrel !

text: Şimdi bize düşen, Ertuğrul'um gelene kadar bu soysuzu oyalamak.
english: Now, our task is to keep this scoundrel occupied until Ertuğrul arrives.

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Çok yaşa Ural Bey'im.

english: You're going to get what's coming to you, Ural! Shame on

text: Yanımda değil de bu hainlerin yanındasın.
english: not with me, you're with these traitors.
You chose your enemies, not your brother. A

text: Eğri adamın yolu doğru gitmez Ural.
english: crooked man's path doesn't lead straight, Ural. You won't get away with what you've done
But he'll get what's coming to him too! He'll learn

text: Beni yarı yolda bırakmak ne demekmiş öğrenecek.
english: what it means to abandon me halfway through .

text: Efendim, Ertuğrul ve Aliyar Bey obaya doğru at sürmekteler.
english: Sir, Ertuğrul and Aliyar Bey are riding their horses towards the camp.
clearly had prior knowledge of the raid.

text: Toy yarım kalmış efendim. Yoksa bu kadar çabuk gelemezlerdi.
english: The wedding was left unfinished, sir. Otherwise, they couldn't have arrived so quickly.
...Mr. Ural, son of Mr. Candar. I swore an oath that I would not let the blood of

text: ...babamın da kanını yerde koymayacağıma and içtim.
english: my father, be spilled in vain .
And behind this oath... ...you will see
how I will stand with my honor .
What honor do you possess, Ural?
As long as Ertuğrul is alive...

text: ...sen ancak dilinle iffetsiz hatunlar gibi zehir saçarsın.
english: ...you will only spew poison with your tongue, like immodest women.
Aliyar are both unaware of what awaits them.
(Ural) Nothing will save you from me.

text: Senin elinden kimler kimler kurtuldu Ural.

english: What was taken from you, huh?

text: Sen kimsin? Neyine güvenir de böyle büyüklenirsin ha?
english: Who are you? What gives you the confidence to be so arrogant?

text: Seni herkes hatunları biçen korkak biri olarak anacak.
english: Everyone will remember you as a cowardly guy who slaughtered women.
If you have the power, raise your men to arms.
(Hayme) He doesn't have the power to stand up to Ertuğrul, my daughter. What else can you expect from

text: Düşmanının kalesine sığınan bir insandan başka ne beklersin?
english: a man who seeks refuge in his enemy's stronghold ? That

text: Senin pusatın var ya, sadece hatunlara yeter.
english: weapon you have, it's only good for women.
Where? Let him come and rescue you.

text: Görelim bakalım, pusatımın gücü ona yetiyor mu yetmiyor mu?
english: Let's see if my weapon is strong enough to defeat him or not.
...your head would have been severed from your body long ago, Ural.

text: Sen ancak kahpe pusular kuran bir hainsin.
english: You are nothing but a traitor who sets up cowardly ambushes . A traitor, huh
-(Aslıhan) Let go! -Leave him alone, you scoundrel! Leave

text: Kardeşi kardeşe düşüren hainlerin sonu nasıl olacakmış...
english: end will be for those traitors who turn brother against brother... Leave
My Bamsi, I can't get enough of you, my Bamsi.

text: Eşhedü en la ilahe illallah ve eşhedü enne Muhammeden abdühü ve resulühü.
english: I bear witness that there is no god but Allah, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His servant and messenger.

text: Seninle aynı kanı taşıdığım için senden utanırım.
english: I am ashamed to share your blood.
The end of my enemies is death! Death!
(Music continues) Since when has it been
part of Turkish tradition... to use
...is not even written in the customs of the infidels.
You will call me Mr. Ural!
...I am the chieftain of this tribe.

text: Sen benim gözümde bir hiçsin Ural!
english: You are nothing to me, Ural! You are a disgrace to
my father's tent and to the
weapon you hold in your hand ! You
took the principality from me through various tricks and gave it to
my brother, who lives in the shadow of Ertuğrul . I

text: ...kendi beylerini öldürtecek kadar küçüldün mü Ural?
english: ...have you become so small, Ural, that you would have your own lords killed?

text: ...ne de obalarımız bu yaptıklarını yanına koymayacaktır.
english: ... nor our tribes will let them get away with what they've done .
...no one can destroy the land and customs of the Turks.
Now it's time to pay the price. Stay back,
(Ertuğrul) You will not only ruin us...
...but also your brothers who have made these lands their homeland...
-(Hayme) Leave my bride alone! -(Halime) Leave me alone!

text: Efendim, bu, işlerin ters gittiğini gösterir.
english: Sir, this indicates that things have gone wrong .

text: Ertuğrul ve Alpleri baskın yapmış olmalı.
english: Ertuğrul and his Alps must have launched a surprise attack.

text: Efendim, Ural Bey'in Alpleri sayıca daha fazla efendim.
english: Sir, Mr. Ural's Alps are more numerous, sir.
War is won not by numbers... but by

text: Hafsa, Hafsa, Hafsa, Hafsa. Kurtaracağım seni, dayanasın.
english: Hafsa, Hafsa, Hafsa, Hafsa. I will save you, hold on.

text: Kurduğun kara düzen başına çöktü Ural!
english: dark system you established has backfired on you, Ural!
You poisoned us all with the poison inside you. Driven by
your passion and your anger... you took the lives of

text: ...nice Alpi, nice beyi, nice masum insanı hayatından ettin.
english: countless Alpi, many beys, and many innocent people. And
the women as shields and hide behind them.
How much lower will you sink, Ural?
I told you to attack! Attack!
Sir, they ask for our help.
Sir, what are we going to do?
...I will wipe out your lineage, Ertuğrul! I
...when you donned the crown of betrayal...
...thought you had become kings. I will not tire

text: Kökünüz kuruyana dek kellenizi almaktan yorulmayacağım.
english: of taking your heads until your roots are completely destroyed .

text: Ekmek ya da su ya da bir eş için değil.
english: Not for bread or water or a spouse. Let
everything be sacrificed for my revenge.
Long live hell for the traitors!
Against the Turks who are united as one...
...there is nothing we can do. We won't be able to do it
I will appear before the Emperor. I will request soldiers.

text: Türkleri Karacahisar Kalesi'nin surlarıyla durduramayacağımız belli.
english: It's clear we can't stop the Turks with the walls of Karacahisar Castle.
I won't come to you until I've taken my revenge, father!
your sins bring you torment, brother.
Our home is in ruins, brother.
We will turn our village into a paradise garden, Aslıhan. It's all over now
have seen both the wrong and the right.
We knew both good and bad.
We learned from experience which branch is rotten.
But we learned it very well.
...is the day we forget these treacheries...
...and step on the same rotten branch again .
...is the day we broke our promise...
...is the day we violated our traditions...
Never be afraid. It is the honorable blood that flows in our veins that keeps
(Ertuğrul) As long as we carry this blood...
...everywhere we set foot is our homeland...
